boardgame.name: Noir of Indines
NOIR: Deductive Mystery Game
NOIR: Deductive Mystery Game – Black Box Edition
NOIR: Killer vs. Inspector
Нуар
boardgame.description: NOIR: Killer vs. Inspector is a two-player game of hidden identities and deduction. Each player receives a secret identity from among 25 suspects and an open role that determines his available moves and victory conditions._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Killer plays by eliminating players, focusing more on intuition and reading his opponent. The Inspector uses secret information and his ability to accuse suspects to create a play style more focused around logical elimination of possibilities._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game plays in 5 to 15 minutes, and is contained in a 54-card deck box for easy travel play._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;NOIR: Deductive Mystery Game _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Black Box Edition includes fifty suspect and fifty innocent cards as well as six game modes _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; including Killer vs. Inspector, Hitman vs. Sleuth, Spy Tag, Master Thief vs. Chief of Police _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; to test your mettle!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgameversion: English first edition (Level 99 Games Minigame Library)
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Episode 12: Noir Black Box Edition Review - Hanabi, The Resistance, Cosmic Encounter and more!

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

Level 99 Games (L99NRB14) The Game is Afoot! Take to the streets for a life or death game of cat and mouse. Plan your moves carefully to avoid the Police or capture the Killer. In the new Black Box Edition, there are 6 game modes to test your mettle and 50 suspects to scrutinize. Will you catch a killer, or end up dead?

Shrinkwrapped and in stock Language: English Within The Netherlands € 4,- per shipment to a Kiala service point near you or € 6,75 per shipment for delivery at your doorstep. Shipment to Belgium by Kiala is € 7,50. Payment is possible by bank transfer or Paypal (costs +3%)
